attributes.action: Provide one day of holiday on or to the nearest work day for every employee's birthday instead of creating a new bank-holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government have been discussing a new bank holiday. Surely we now have enough, so why not reward each employee by allowing one day of holiday on or to the nearest work day off for their birthday.  This will help raise morale in the work place and raise the importance of enjoying a work/life balance
